verses.verse: Maschil of Asaph. O God <WH430>, why hast thou cast us off <WH2186> for ever <WH5331>? Why doth thine anger <WH639> smoke <WH6225> against the sheep <WH6629> of thy pasture <WH4830>?

Remember <WH2142> thy congregation <WH5712>, which thou hast gotten <WH7069> of old <WH6924>, Which <WH7626> thou hast redeemed <WH1350> to be the tribe of thine inheritance <WH5159>; And mount <WH2022> Zion <WH6726>, wherein thou hast dwelt <WH7931>.
Lift up <WH7311> thy feet <WH6471> unto the perpetual <WH5331> ruins <WH4876>, All the evil <WH7489> that the enemy <WH341> hath done in the sanctuary <WH6944>.
Thine adversaries <WH6887> have roared <WH7580> in the midst <WH7130> of thine assembly <WH4150>; They have set up <WH7760> their ensigns <WH226> for signs <WH226>.
They seemed <WH3045> as men that lifted up <WH935> Axes <WH7134> upon a thicket <WH5442> of trees <WH6086>.
And now <WH3162> all the carved work <WH6603> thereof They break down <WH1986> with hatchet <WH3781> and hammers <WH3597>.
They have set <WH7971> thy sanctuary <WH4720> on fire <WH784>; They have profaned <WH2490> the dwelling-place <WH4908> of thy name <WH8034> by casting it to the ground <WH776>.
They said <WH559> in their heart <WH3820>, Let us make havoc <WH3238> of them altogether <WH3162>: They have burned up <WH8313> all the synagogues <WH4150> of God <WH410> in the land <WH776>.
We see <WH7200> not our signs <WH226>: There is no more any prophet <WH5030>; Neither is there among us any that knoweth <WH3045> how long <WH5704>.
How long <WH430>, O God, shall the adversary <WH6862> reproach <WH2778>? Shall the enemy <WH341> blaspheme <WH5006> thy name <WH8034> for ever <WH5331>?
Why drawest <WH7725> thou back thy hand <WH3027>, even thy right hand <WH3027>? Pluck <WH3615> it out of <WH7130> thy bosom and consume them <WH2436>.
Yet God <WH430> is my King <WH4428> of old <WH6924>, Working <WH6466> salvation <WH3444> in the midst <WH7130> of the earth <WH776>.
Thou didst divide <WH6565> the sea <WH3220> by thy strength <WH5797>: Thou brakest <WH7665> the heads <WH7218> of the sea-monsters <WH8577> in the waters <WH4325>.
Thou brakest <WH7533> the heads <WH7218> of leviathan <WH3882> in pieces <WH5414>; Thou gavest him to be food <WH3978> to the people <WH5971> inhabiting the wilderness <WH6728>.
Thou didst cleave <WH1234> fountain <WH4599> and flood <WH5158>: Thou driedst up <WH3001> mighty <WH386> rivers <WH5104>.
The day <WH3117> is thine <WH3915>, the night also is thine <WH3559>: Thou hast prepared the light <WH3974> and the sun <WH8121>.
Thou hast set <WH5324> all the borders <WH1367> of the earth <WH776>: Thou hast made <WH3335> summer <WH7019> and winter <WH2779>.
Remember <WH2142> this <WH341>, that the enemy hath reproached <WH2778>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, And that a foolish <WH5036> people <WH5971> hath blasphemed <WH5006> thy name <WH8034>.
Oh deliver <WH5414> not the soul <WH5315> of thy turtle-dove <WH8449> unto the wild beast <WH2416>: Forget <WH7911> not the life <WH2416> of thy poor <WH6041> for ever <WH5331>.
Have respect <WH5027> unto the covenant <WH1285>; For the dark <WH4285> places of the earth <WH776> are full <WH4390> of the habitations <WH4999> of violence <WH2555>.
Oh let not the oppressed <WH1790> return <WH7725> ashamed <WH3637>: Let the poor <WH6041> and needy <WH34> praise <WH1984> thy name <WH8034>.
Arise <WH6965>, O God <WH430>, plead <WH7378> thine own cause <WH7379>: Remember <WH2142> how the foolish man <WH5036> reproacheth <WH2781> thee all the day <WH3117>.
Forget <WH7911> not the voice <WH6963> of thine adversaries <WH6887>: The tumult <WH7588> of those that rise up <WH6965> against thee ascendeth <WH5927> continually <WH8548>.
